div.button: Covid-19 Resources for Parents and students

div.a: March 17, 2020 Hannah Cole Primary Parent Letter​
Online Learning Letter from Hannah Cole Primary

div.div:
​The Boonville School District is committed to providing quality education to our students. While our students safely learn at home, providing nutrition for them in the form of a breakfast/lunch combo pack is another way that we can help our students during this time. Our school food service program is preparing for meal pack pickups/deliveries from 8:00 A.M.-10:00 A.M. at the Gmelich Street entrance of David Barton on every weekday during the school closure for students.
Please click the "Nutrition Form" button below if you would like to have a breakfast/lunch pack prepared daily for your student.
**Please note, yesterday's form was an interest inventory so that we could begin to plan.​ The data collected from this form will be used to help us know for certain which students need meals. We also need delivery addresses for the logistics of distribution.
